comments:
Note that this did not occur upon restarting workbench, probably because the offending editors were already closed.

This appears to be resolved and I did a bit of clean-up.  We should watch for it and reopen if it happens again.
Just noticed it again, harmless, but need to figure it out.
Should be fixed now, let's still keep an eye on it.
